page.title: 21Candlemas correction
page.content:
When I wrote the piece on the Hill of Barra for the Project in 1985-6, I may have made type error or there has been an error in transcription. The full correct version of the Candlemas poem is:

'IF Candlemas BE dull and cool

Half the winter's over at Yule,

If Candlemas be FINE and Fair

Half the winter's to come and mair'

Thank you for making the project publicly available online: what an achievement BBC!
Contribution by: Marian Youngblood
